text: - Devoteam are a consulting firm,
specializing in AI data and sustainability
and cloud platforms.
Devoteam are a AWS Premier Partner
and achieve the gen AI competency
as one of the scale partners in March.

Due to the gen AI
prominence at the moment,
our customers are facing challenges

understanding how gen AI
can bring business value.

They need to understand the
security and privacy issues,

and also how they can
bring it to production,
and how they can do that quickly.
We helped LightOn with a migration to AWS,
we migrated their data to AWS
and then helped them build their models
in SageMaker and marketplace.
So by doing this,
we enabled them to publish models
into marketplace within 10 minutes,
which before was taking them one day.

Another customer we helped
to move a use case production

was a enterprise telecoms
company in France.

And we supported them to
implement a new virtual assistant
for their contact center,
which use RAG and Bedrock and SageMaker
to access their knowledge bases
to help answer customer questions
and improve their customer engagement.

The support we receive
from the AWS partner teams
and specialist gen AI teams

enable us to build, earn
trust with customers,
and deliver multiple production use cases
for our customers.
